info.name: Shothik AI - Grammar Fix APIs
info.description:
Complete API collection for Grammar Fix product/service in Shothik AI v3.

The Grammar Fix helps identify and correct grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors in text content.

**Base URL:** https://api-qa.shothik.ai

**Total APIs:** 5 endpoints

request.description:
Check text for grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors.

**Issue Types:**
- `grammar`: Grammar errors
- `spelling`: Spelling mistakes
- `punctuation`: Punctuation errors
- `style`: Style recommendations

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "score": 65,
    "issues": [
      {
        "id": "issue_1",
        "error": "have",
        "correct": "has",
        "sentence": "This sentence have many mistake that needs to be fix.",
        "context": "sentence have many",
        "type": "grammar",
        "explanation": "Use 'has' with singular subjects like 'sentence'."
      },
      {
        "id": "issue_2",
        "error": "mistake",
        "correct": "mistakes",
        "sentence": "This sentence have many mistake that needs to be fix.",
        "context": "many mistake that",
        "type": "grammar",
        "explanation": "Use plural 'mistakes' after 'many'."
      },
      {
        "id": "issue_3",
        "error": "Their",
        "correct": "They're",
        "sentence": "Their going to the store tommorrow.",
        "context": "Their going to",
        "type": "spelling",
        "explanation": "'They're' is the contraction of 'they are'."
      },
      {
        "id": "issue_4",
        "error": "tommorrow",
        "correct": "tomorrow",
        "sentence": "Their going to the store tommorrow.",
        "context": "store tommorrow",
        "type": "spelling",
        "explanation": "Correct spelling is 'tomorrow'."
      },
      {
        "id": "issue_5",
        "error": "seen",
        "correct": "saw",
        "sentence": "I seen him yesterday at the park.",
        "context": "I seen him",
        "type": "grammar",
        "explanation": "Use 'saw' (past tense) instead of 'seen' (past participle)."
      }
    ],
    "recommendations": [],
    "summary": {
      "totalIssues": 5,
      "grammarIssues": 3,
      "spellingIssues": 2,
      "punctuationIssues": 0
    }
  }
}
